pages.text: wajaa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikatu bil-khati-ati
faʿasaw rasula rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rabiyatan
inna lamma tagha l-mau hamalnakum fi l-jariyati
linajʿalaha lakum tadhkiratan wataʿiyaha udhunun waʿiyatun
fa-idha nufikha fi l-suri nafkhatun wahidatun
wahumilati l-ardu wal-jibalu fadukkata dakkatan wahidatan
fayawma-idhin waqaʿati l-waqiʿatu
wa-inshaqqati l-samau fahiya yawma-idhin wahiyatun
wal-malaku ʿala arjaiha wayahmilu ʿarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamaniyatun
yawma-idhin tuʿ'raduna la takhfa minkum khafiyatun
fa-amma man utiya kitabahu biyaminihi fayaqulu haumu iq'rau kitabiyah
inni zanantu anni mulaqin hisabiyah
fahuwa fi ʿishatin radiyatin
fi jannatin ʿaliyatin
qutufuha daniyatun
kulu wa-ish'rabu hanian bima aslaftum fi l-ayami l-khaliyati
wa-amma man utiya kitabahu bishimalihi fayaqulu yalaytani lam uta kitabiyah
walam adri ma hisabiyah
yalaytaha kanati l-qadiyata
ma aghna ʿanni maliyah
halaka ʿanni sul'taniyah
khudhuhu faghulluhu
thumma l-jahima salluhu
thumma fi sil'silatin dharʿuha sabʿuna dhiraʿan fa-us'lukuhu
innahu kana la yu'minu bil-lahi l-ʿazimi
wala yahuddu ʿala taʿami l-mis'kini
